get.description: Make sure api is up and running
Enter a search query and get lines that match.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query

parameters.name: searchtype
parameters.description: Type of search. { 0: First letter each word from start (Gurmukhi), 1: First letter each word anywhere(Gurmukhi), 2: Full Word (Gurmukhi), 3: Full Word Translation (English), 4: Romanized Gurmukhi (English), 5: Ang, 6: Main Letter (Gurmukhi), 7: Romanized first letter anywhere (English) }

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source to search in. { G: Guru Granth Sahib Ji, D: Dasam Granth Sahib, B: Bhai Gurdas Ji Vaaran, A: Amrit Keertan, S: Bhai Gurdas Singh Ji Vaaran N: Bhai Nand Lal Ji Vaaran, R: Rehatnamas & Panthic Sources }

parameters.name: ang
parameters.description: Which ang to return. Required if searchtype is 5

parameters.name: raag
parameters.description: Which raag to limit search to.

parameters.name: writer
parameters.description: Which writer to limit search to.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination param. Which page to return.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: Pagination param. How many results per page to return.
